description.p: Defines the space between the bottom of the frame and the object below it.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Spacing below]* property can be used to increase the amout of space between the bottom of the frame and the item below it, such as another control or the bottom of the screen. Spacing is defined using CSS syntax. For example, 2in or 20px.
